analyzed: puṭṭhā asi me pāṇi pameyya majjhe
akkhāhi me nāman ca bandhave ca

original: Na hi nūna santi idha lokapālā;
analyzed: na hi nūna santi idha lokapālā
tat ce tuvam rakkhasā ādesi kañña

original: Muddhā ca hi sattadhā te phaleyya;
analyzed: muddhā ca hi sattadhā te phaleyya

original: Na dāni me tāta tathā yathā pure.
analyzed: na dāni me tāta tathā yathā pure

original: Sace ahaṁ tāta tathā yathā pure,
analyzed: sace aham tāta tathā yathā pure
patim tam uñchāya punā vane bhare

original: Sammānaye maṁ na ca maṁ vimānaye,
analyzed: sammānaye mam na ca mam vimānaye

original: Itopi me tāta tato varaṁ siyā.
analyzed: itas upi me tāta tatas varam siyā
api ce daliddā kapaṇā an āḷhiyā
ayam eva seyyā kapaṇā api yā piyā
su dulla bhitthī purisassa yā hitā

original: Hitā ca te sīlavatī ca bhariyā,
analyzed: hitā ca te sīlavatī ca bhariyā
aham ca te bhadde imā rāja kaññā
sabbe te vacana karāḥ bhavāma ati
